title: Comforting
review: I put this on sometimes. Usually on Sundays when the weather is depressing or something happened or I want some Innocence to erase whatever gross display of hedonism I witnessed on Friday and Saturday. It's good for that. It's not a great work of art or anything but then it wasn't meant to be. Intellectuals born in 1947 won't like it. Douchy know-it-alls who think they're so cool won't either. Those who once wanted a Mogwai or called themselves a Goonie Will. However Spielberg has really lost it. I can't believe he took the guns out of the movie! The heartless bastard.... (He also asked Drew Barrymore to keep her clothes on back when she was in her nekkid phase.) There had better be an option on the DVD. South Park did an excellent episode where they totally called him on it.
